headline: The J. M. Smucker Company Announces Cash Tender Offers
summary: The J. M. Smucker Company (the "Company") (NYSE: SJM) today announced that it has commenced cash tender offers (each, an "Offer" and collectively, the "Offers") for the maximum principal amount of validly tendered (and not validly withdrawn) notes set forth below (collectively, the "Notes"), such that the aggregate purchase price, not including accrued and unpaid interest, payable in respect of such Notes will not exceed $300 million.

raw.headline: The J. M. Smucker Company Announces Cash Tender Offers
raw.summary: The J. M. Smucker Company (the "Company") (NYSE: SJM) today announced that it has commenced cash tender offers (each, an "Offer" and collectively, the "Offers") for the maximum principal amount of validly tendered (and not validly withdrawn) notes set forth below (collectively, the "Notes"), such that the aggregate purchase price, not including accrued and unpaid interest, payable in respect of such Notes will not exceed $300 million.

headline: J.M. Smucker Divests Voortman to Sharpen Focus on Core Growth
summary: SJM's divestiture of the Voortman cookie brand represents a strategic move to streamline its portfolio and concentrate on high-growth, high-margin segments.
